attributes.action: Petition the U.N to invade Zimbabwe in order to force a regime change.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The people's voice was not heard when it came to Iraq, Iraq has oil so we sent the troops in, Zimbabwe is not an oil producer so we sit by and let Mugabe terrorise his people. I would like the U.N to sanction an invasion of Zimbabwe in order to remove Mugabe and all other parties involved in the violence, allow the properly elected government to take it's rightful place and for the guilty to stand trial in The Hague for crimes against humanity.
We owe it to the innocent victims of the Mugabe regime to take the action that the rest of Africa is too afraid to take, to mete out justice in a worthwhile cause., Mugabe is a despot, he MUST go.

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=mugabe&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=memorial&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
